name: I Knowledge Factory Pvt. Ltd.
description:
I Knowledge Factory Pvt Ltd. is a firm specializing in 360 degree Digital Marketing and Brandvertising (Brand Lifter + Advertising).

Our Mission is to get Businesses BIG. We serve with digital ideas and solutions. IKF bestows rangers who are tech geeks, designers, smarketers (Smart Marketers), story-makers, trendsetters and innovators dedicated in creating and managing some of the best brand led activities in the country and globe.
